meanings.definition: Sound or sounds that are loud, unpleasant, or unexpected.
meanings.sent1: The noises from the construction site were very loud.
meanings.sent2: I heard strange noises coming from the attic last night.
meanings.sent3: The noises of the squeaky door made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The noises of the thunderstorm outside were like a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The noises of the fireworks filled the night sky with color.

meanings.definition: A sound or sounds that are made by animals or people.
meanings.sent1: The noises of the birds chirping woke me up early.
meanings.sent2: I could hear noises of laughter coming from the party next door.
meanings.sent3: The noises of the dog barking alerted us to the visitor.
meanings.sent4: The noises of the crowd at the concert were like a wave of energy.
meanings.sent5: The noises of the children playing in the park were joyful and carefree.

meanings.definition: A sound or sounds that are made by objects or machines.
meanings.sent1: The noises of the car engine starting echoed in the garage.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't sleep because of the noises of the clock ticking.
meanings.sent3: The noises of the old computer were like music to my ears.
meanings.sent4: The noises of the wind chimes in the garden were soothing and calming.
meanings.sent5: The noises of the washing machine running could be heard throughout the house.
